newest.message:
== Contributors for this version ==
* Jimi
== Bug Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue where tip window was not displayed when reseting settings. * Fixed an issue where EVEMon was not prompting to backup the settings file with the correct revision number when re-starting after an update. * Fixed a crash bug when parsing email credentials in Emailer. * Fixed a bug where "Time to Elite Grade" was shown incorrectly in Certificate browser. * Fixed a serious bug when assigning the installation of an industry job. * Fixed a crash bug in Attributes Optimizer.
== Enhancements ==
* EVEMon will always prompt for new data files even if the latest release has been denied.
== Misc ==
* Removed the storaging of a character's standings in settings file, thus reducing the size of it. * Several improvements have been done to the base code to make EVEMon a better and more stable application.
